text: Match Fruits: Line up three or more identical fruits to clear them from the board.
Use Power-ups: Boost your gameplay with unique power-ups like the Fruit Bomb.
Achieve Goals: Each level has specific objectives to accomplish within limited moves.
Unlock Levels: Progress through levels and unlock new and exciting challenges.
Compete with Friends: Connect to social media to see how your scores stack up against your friendsâ€™.
